item.title: 英国FCAが新たなガイダンスで、インフルエンサーが金融商品を売り込む際にリスク警告を行わなければ、最高2年の禁固刑に処せられると警告した（Aisha S Gani/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Aisha S Gani / Bloomberg:
The UK FCA's new guidance warns influencers they face up to two years in prison if they don't give risk warnings when pitching financial products  —  - Financial adverts on social media must now carry risk warnings  — Watchdog says violators could face up to two years in prison

item.title: 秘境」に焦点を当て、近年ネパールで最も人気のあるジャーナリズムのひとつとなったYouTubeのシリーズ「Herne Katha」を見てみよう（Bibek Bhandari/South China Morning Post）。
item.description:
Bibek Bhandari / South China Morning Post:
A look at the YouTube series Herne Katha, which became one of Nepal's most popular journalistic endeavours in recent years by focusing on “unexplored” regions  —  - Since 2018, the series has been travelling to ‘unexplored places’ in Nepal to tell deeply personal stories of people who rarely receive media coverage

item.title: アンペール分析：BBCは2023年に英国で放送される256本の脚本番組のうち129本を許可したが、制作費の削減は主に安価で制作できる脚本外番組に影響した（マックス・ゴールドハート／Deadline）。
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
Ampere Analysis: the BBC greenlit 129 of the 256 scripted TV shows in the UK in 2023, as production cuts mainly impacted cheaper-to-produce unscripted programs  —  The BBC commissioned half of all UK TV scripted last year, defying the slowdown that hit its rivals and streamers and spending big …

item.title: ゴールデン・グローブ賞とCBSが、2025年1月のテレビ放送から5年間、CBSでの放送とParamount+でのライブストリーミングを行う契約を締結（Selome Hailu/Variety）
item.description:
Selome Hailu / Variety:
Golden Globes and CBS sign a deal to air the awards on CBS and livestream on Paramount+ for five years, starting from the January 2025 telecast  —  The Golden Globes will air on CBS and livestream on Paramount+ for another five years, per a new deal that also puts the American Music Awards on the Eye Network.

item.title: アルジャジーラによると、エジプトはカタールとの関係融和を受け、同国で拘束されていたアルジャジーラ記者2人を解放した（ロイター）。
item.description:
Reuters:
Al Jazeera says Egypt has freed the last two Al Jazeera journalists who were in detention in the country, following a thaw in Egypt's relations with Qatar  —  Egypt has freed the last two Al Jazeera journalists who remained in detention in the North African country following a thaw in relations with Qatar …

item.title: ESPN、ボストンのスポーツチームを放送するNESNを皮切りに、地域スポーツネットワークの動画フィードへのリンクをメインアプリとウェブサイトに統合開始（Dade Hayes/Deadline）
item.description:
Dade Hayes / Deadline:
ESPN begins integrating links to video feeds from regional sports networks into its main app and website, starting with NESN, which carries Boston sports teams  —  As the viewing landscape continues to get more complex, ESPN is aiming to streamline things for sports fans by integrating links …

item.title: 米判事がXのCCDHに対する訴えを棄却、「被告らの言論を罰する」目的で起こされたものだと指摘（Jonathan Stempel/Reuters）
item.description:
Jonathan Stempel / Reuters:
A US judge dismisses X's lawsuit against CCDH, saying the lawsuit had been brought as a means toward “punishing the defendants for their speech”  —  A U.S. judge on Monday dismiss X Corp's lawsuit against a nonprofit group that has criticized a rise in hate speech …

item.title: NBCを筆頭とする米企業メディアは、ドナルド・トランプとの関係を静かに再構築している。
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
The US corporate media, led by NBC, quietly rebuilds its ties to Donald Trump, as the reality sinks in that they may soon be dealing with a Trump administration  —  The News  —  For weeks before NBC News journalists exploded into open revolt Sunday over the network's hire of a top Donald Trump supporter …

item.title: ウクライナのジャーナリストの中には、政府の汚職を調査したり、ゼレンスキーを批判したりする人たちに対して、国の情報機関がKGBスタイルの戦術を使っていると言う人もいる（Anna Nemtsova/The Daily Beast）
item.description:
Anna Nemtsova / The Daily Beast:
Some Ukrainian journalists say the country's intel agencies are using KGB-style tactics on those who investigate government corruption and criticize Zelensky  —  THIN SKIN  —  Hired attackers, intimidation, and “kompromat” spy cameras set up by Ukraine's intel agencies are among the tactics …

Todd Spangler / Variety:
Nelson Peltz backs Bob Iger, saying his proxy fight is with Disney's board for botching “its most important job, CEO succession, by installing Bob Chapek”  —  With just over a week before Disney's annual shareholder meeting on April 3, Peltz's Trian Group …

item.title: ベラルーシの裁判所は、RFE/RLのライターである著名ジャーナリスト、イハール・カルネイに対し、過激派グループに参加した罪で懲役3年の判決を下した（ジャーナリスト保護委員会）
item.description:
Committee to Protect Journalists:
A Belarus court sentences prominent journalist Ihar Karnei, a writer for RFE/RL, to three years in prison on charges of participating in an extremist group  —  The Committee to Protect Journalists condemned the sentencing on Friday of Belarusian journalist Ihar Karnei to three years in prison …

item.title: 米国は、イデオロギー、富、仕事、年齢、場所によって12のニュースバブルに分裂しており、世論を把握し、共通の合意を見出すことが難しくなっている。
item.description:
Axios:
The US has splintered into 12 news bubbles based on ideology, wealth, jobs, age, and location, making gauging public opinion and finding common agreement hard  —  - The Musk-eteers: This is a fast-growing, mostly male group who feed off Twitter, podcasts (especially “All-In” and Joe Rogan) …

item.title: Spotify、BBC Maestro、Skillshare、Thinkific、PlayVirtuosoのオンラインコースを追加、音楽、ビジネス、クリエイティビティ、健康をカバー、英国限定の試み（Jon Porter/The Verge）
item.description:
Jon Porter / The Verge:
Spotify adds online courses from BBC Maestro, Skillshare, Thinkific, and PlayVirtuoso, covering music, business, creativity, and health, as a UK-only experiment  —  Spotify's UK users are getting access to a fourth category of content to sit alongside its existing library of songs, podcasts and audiobooks: online courses.

item.title: データにこだわるネットフリックスのグレッグ・ピーターズ共同CEOと、タレントとの仕事を好むテッド・サランドス共同CEOが、いかにしてストリーミングサービスを軌道に乗せたか（Jessica Toonkel/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Jessica Toonkel / Wall Street Journal:
How Netflix co-CEOs Greg Peters, who is obsessed with data, and Ted Sarandos, who relishes working with talent, together got the streaming service back on track  —  As co-CEOs, Hollywood czar Ted Sarandos and data-obsessed techie Greg Peters have gotten the streamer back on track

item.title: フィナンシャル・タイムズのクロードが開発したAIチャットボット「Ask FT」は、FTの記事で学習し、FTプロフェッショナルの一部購読者が利用できる（The Verge）。
item.description:
The Verge:
A look at the Financial Times' Claude-powered AI chatbot Ask FT, which is trained on FT's articles and available to some subscribers in the FT Professional tier  —  The Financial Times has a new generative AI chatbot called Ask FT that can answer questions its subscribers ask.
